characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a brown car, driver of a black SUV
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A white sedan and a brown car are visible on the left side, while a black SUV is on the right side. The white sedan suddenly moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. The brown car and black SUV maintain their positions, but the white sedans abrupt lane change poses a risk.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the sudden lane change of the white sedan. The vehicles speed remains steady to avoid collision with the white sedan that has cut into its lane.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing a cut-in situation. 2) Left side: A brown car, approximately 3 meters away, maintaining its position. 3) Right side: A black SUV, approximately 4 meters away, maintaining its position.
